summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4231 for the improvement of McGraw Street, from a connection with the existing sewer on 8th Avenue North to a point approximately 169 feet west of Taylor Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing trunk sewer, subsewer and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50241, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
